docs.lead_paragraph: Will those with the most hope get the worst treatment?
docs.abstract: Op-Ed article by medical student Edward Larkin and psychiatry Prof Irene Hurford describes how some patients who suffer from schizophrenia, particularly those who are high-functioning schizophrenics, often must use older drugs due to their finances; notes that newer drugs have fewer side effects and are more effective, but cost significantly more.
docs.snippet: Will those with the most hope get the worst treatment?

byline.original: By EDWARD LARKIN and IRENE HURFORD

docs.lead_paragraph: If a C.E.O. rejected a deal offering an infinite rate of return, shareholders would probably sue. Not so when the C.E.O. is a governor and the deal involves Medicaid.

headline.main: A Deal Too Good to Turn Down, Unless It’s Medicaid

docs.snippet: If a C.E.O. rejected a deal offering an infinite rate of return, shareholders would probably sue. Not so when the C.E.O. is a governor and the deal involves Medicaid.

docs.lead_paragraph: WellPoint, one of the biggest players on the health care overhaul's new insurance exchanges, wants to switch its corporate name back to the Anthem brand its customers know by the end of this year.

headline.main: Insurer WellPoint Plans Name Change to Anthem
headline.print_headline: Insurer WellPoint Plans Name Change to Anthem

docs.snippet: WellPoint, one of the biggest players on the health care overhaul's new insurance exchanges, wants to switch its corporate name back to the Anthem brand its customers know by the end of this year.

docs.lead_paragraph: Starting a $75 million national advertising blitz, both parties' House campaign arms on Tuesday began running television spots that are not expected to relent before November's elections.

headline.main: House Campaign Groups Start $75M Ad Push
headline.print_headline: House Campaign Groups Start $75M Ad Push

docs.snippet: Starting a $75 million national advertising blitz, both parties' House campaign arms on Tuesday began running television spots that are not expected to relent before November's elections.

docs.lead_paragraph: Hundreds of thousands of people who signed up under the new health care law risk losing their taxpayer-subsidized insurance unless they act quickly to resolve questions about their citizenship or immigration status. The government warned on Tuesday that they have just over three weeks to show that they're eligible.

headline.main: Deadline to Clear Up Health Law Eligibility Near
headline.print_headline: Deadline to Clear Up Health Law Eligibility Near

docs.snippet: Hundreds of thousands of people who signed up under the new health care law risk losing their taxpayer-subsidized insurance unless they act quickly to resolve questions about their citizenship or immigration status. The government warned on Tuesday...

docs.lead_paragraph: UK insurer Prudential Plc posted a jump in first-half profit as a strong performance in Asia and the United States offset negative currency swings in some of its most important markets.

headline.main: UK Insurer Prudential's Profits Lifted by Asia, U.S
headline.print_headline: UK Insurer Prudential's Profits Lifted by Asia, U.S

docs.snippet: UK insurer Prudential Plc posted a jump in first-half profit as a strong performance in Asia and the United States offset negative currency swings in some of its most important markets.

docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's top shares were pegged back on Tuesday by tension between the West and Russia over Ukraine, although robust results lifted insurance and pensions group Prudential.

headline.main: FTSE Held Back by Growing Ukraine Tension; Prudential Lends Support
headline.print_headline: FTSE Held Back by Growing Ukraine Tension; Prudential Lends Support

docs.snippet: Britain's top shares were pegged back on Tuesday by tension between the West and Russia over Ukraine, although robust results lifted insurance and pensions group Prudential.

docs.lead_paragraph: Apple Inc has been discussing how its "HealthKit" service will work with health providers at Mount Sinai, the Cleveland Clinic and Johns Hopkins as well as with Allscripts, a competitor to electronic health records provider Epic Systems, people familiar with the discussions said.

headline.main: Exclusive: Apple Prepares Healthkit Rollout Amid Tangled Regulatory Web
headline.print_headline: Exclusive: Apple Prepares Healthkit Rollout Amid Tangled Regulatory Web
